name: Course Attend Notification
description: Notify enrolled users when a course date is 3 days away
message: Hi {{fullName}}, your course {{courseName}} is in {{daysToGo}} days on {{courseDate}}. Please attend.

name: Course Missed Notification
description: Notify enrolled users one day after the course date if they missed
message: Hi {{fullName}}, your course {{courseName}} on {{courseDate}} was missed. Please reschedule or enroll again.

name: Weekly Upcoming Course Broadcast
description: Send weekly notifications listing courses in the upcoming month to users not enrolled
message: Hi {{fullName}}, upcoming courses next month: {{coursesList}}. Reply to enroll.
